name: Xalostore
subtitle: A source for all of my apps
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find all of my apps.

apps.name: Xalo ImgAi
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on Xalostore.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need to use the camera to snap a photo.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save images to your photo library.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Let us enhance your experience with personalized content.

apps.name: Xalo WhatsApp
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on Xalostore.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This lets you connect to supported Bluetooth devices
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This lets you connect to supported Bluetooth devices
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: âThis lets you create events on your calendar.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: âThis lets you make video calls, take photos, and record videos.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: âUpload your contacts to WhatsApp's servers to help you quickly get in touch with your friends and help us provide a better experience.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: âUse Face ID to authenticate on WhatsApp.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: âThis will let you use WhatsApp to place and receive calls through devices that are on the same Wi-Fi or local access networks.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: âIf you always allow access to your location, you can choose to share your live location, and it will update even when you're not using the app. If you only allow access while using the app, you can only send your current location or a nearby place.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: âIf you always allow access to your location, you can choose to share your live location, and it will update even when you're not using the app. This also lets you send your current location or a nearby place.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: âThis lets you send your current location or nearby places in chats.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: âThis lets you make calls, send voice messages, and record videos with sound.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: âThis lets you save photos and videos to your library.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: âThis lets you send photos and videos from your library and save the ones you capture.
privacy.NSRemindersUsageDescription: âThis lets you set reminders to call your friends back.
privacy.NSSiriUsageDescription: âThis lets you use Siri to quickly send and read messages and make calls.
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: WhatsApp does on-device recognition for Voice Messages. In this mode, no voice data is sent to Apple despite this alert, which is unexpected. Select "Don't Allow" and report to WhatsApp.

apps.name: Xalo YouTube+
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on Xalostore.

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YouTube will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.

apps.name: Xalo AiChatBot
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on Xalostore.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: To take a photo with your camera and extract or generate text for it, please allow access to Camera in your device Settings.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We would like to access your microphone to allow the application create voice memos for you during theory test
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: To enter text from a photo or to generate text for an image, please allow access to Photos in your device Settings.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: To enter text from a photo or to generate text for an image, please allow access to Photos in your device Settings.
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: We would like to recognize your speech to use the app in hands-free mode
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to bring you timely and relevant content and make your experience with the app more personalized.

apps.name: Xalo MyFitnessPal
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on Xalostore.

privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Allows MyFitnessPal to add class reservations to your calendar.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: We use your camera to allow you to scan barcodes, foods, and add photos to your weight entries and custom meals.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Allows MyFitnessPal to read data from the Health app.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Allows MyFitnessPal to write data to the Health app.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We use your microphone to allow you to log food with your voice.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need photo library access in order to scan meals, log using barcodes, and add photos to weight entries/custom meals.
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Voice Log uses speech recognition technology to understand and interpret what you're saying.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This info will be used to show you ads that are more relevant to you.

apps.name: Xalo Truecaller
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on Xalostore.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you take a photo and set it as your profile picture.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: We need this permission to allow you to save contacts or check which of your contacts use Truecaller. We never upload your phonebook.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Truecaller needs access to your microphone to answer calls
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Photo Library access is required for selecting photos
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This allows us to give you a more personalized experience.

apps.name: Xalo AIVideo
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow to save video in library
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow microphone permission to record voice
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow to save video in library
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: We need access to speech recognition to transcribe audio input for voice cloning.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads to you

apps.name: Xalo Instagram
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on Xalostore.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This allows your phone to find and connect to the glasses using a Bluetooth connection.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This will let Instagram sync events to your calendar.
privacy.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: This will let Instagram sync events to your calendar.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Instagram uses your device's camera to do things like help you take photos, record videos and use effects.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Instagram will use your contacts to suggest people and things you care about, and offer a better service. Your contacts will be periodically synced and securely stored on Instagramâs servers.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Enable Face ID for quick and secure authentication on Instagram.
privacy.NSFocusStatusUsageDescription: This allows Instagram to check to see if youâve been missing notifications from friends. You can always change this later in settings.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Instagram uses this to make some features work, personalize content and help people find places. You can change your preferences at any time in your device settings.
privacy.NSLocationUsageDescription: Instagram uses this to make some features work, personalize content and help people find places. You can change your preferences at any time in your device settings.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Instagram uses this to make some features work, personalize content and help people find places. You can change your preferences at any time in your device settings.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Instagram uses your device's microphone to do things like help you record videos and preview audio effects.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save photos and videos to your Camera Roll.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Instagram uses access to your camera roll to do things like help you share photos and videos to Instagram, apply effects and suggest photos and videos to share.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This allows Instagram to provide you with a better ads experience.

news.title: Now MyFitnessPal Available only on Xalostore!!!
